data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Pyron, R. Alexander, Reynolds, R. Graham, Burbrink, Frank T. (2014): A Taxonomic Revision of Boas (Serpentes: Boidae). Zootaxa 3846 (2): 249-260, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3846.2.5
